item.description: WALK and LUNCH at the lovely West Hartford Reservoir in Farmington starting at 11 am. What a nice way to spend a summer Sunday morning! The walk takes about an hour and the water view is super. Come join us! We usually have a great turnout. After walk, we?ll go to an area restaurant for lunch. No charge for walk. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions: I-84 Exit 39 (Rt. 4), turn right at light, go past UCONN Medical Center, entrance on left, follow road to back parking lot.
item.how_to_find_us: I?ll be standing by my car in the parking lot.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Walk & Lunch
